Title: Prohibits the use of corporal punishment in an educational setting
Summary: Prohibits the use of corporal punishment in an educational setting; defines corporal punishment as an act of physical force upon a pupil for the purpose of punishing the pupil.
LawCode: Amd ยง1125, add ยง1135, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting corporal punishment in educational settings
